title: 90 Days of Spring - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Beautiful Female Lead   Body Swap   Cute Protagonist   Different Social Status   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Identity   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Kind Love Interests   Naive Protagonist   Possession   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Royalty
author: Feng He You Yue   风荷游月
description:
Human body with fishtail was known as mermaid.

They were pretty and mysterious, their tears congealed to a pearl worth a city.

Miao Miao never thought that one day she would set foot on the lake shore as a human.

She had no desire, only wanted to be close to a man.

Even though she was seeking her own doom, but she gladly endured the hardship.

—— I like you, for ninety days.>
